subject: Re: [junit] Re: Future of testing tools
msgSnippet: ... I wasn t at the meeting, but I think the list given was simply of the tools who had representatives in the Pacific Northwest at the time. There was
messageBody:
On 2/9/07, Joel Altman <joel.g.altman@...> wrote:
> I noticed your map doesn't include CppUnit...
> [...]
> Is this because the group doesn't see C++ as a future
> language?

I wasn't at the meeting, but I think the list given was simply of the
tools who had representatives in the Pacific Northwest at the time.
There was probably no editorial intent in inclusion or exclusion.

David Saff
